articles.author: Adam  Harrington
articles.title: Judge, wife shot and wounded at home in Lafayette, Indiana - CBS News
articles.description: A judge and his wife were shot and wounded in their home over the weekend in Lafayette, Indiana.
articles.content:
A manhunt continued Monday after a judge and his wife were shot and wounded in their home in Lafayette, Indiana.
Tippecanoe Superior Court 2 Judge Steven Meyer and his wife, Kimberly, were shot at t… [+2579 chars]
